column.name: synopsis
column.value: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

column.name: title
column.value: Back to the Future Part II

column.name: synopsis
column.value: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

column.name: title
column.value: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

column.name: synopsis
column.value: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

column.name: title
column.value: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

column.name: synopsis
column.value: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.
